ygData.subject: Just a thought...
ygData.msgSnippet: I am one of those people that truly believes in conspiracy theories and in my opinion the CFPole is a conspiracy.  How do we all know that someone on this very
ygData.messageBody:
I am one of those people that truly believes in conspiracy theories and in my
opinion the CFPole is a conspiracy. How do we all know that someone on this
very list might have given us a so called "broken recipe" and it was actually
the right one but they wanted to throw people off and have people not try it?
Cause think about it if someone turns in a recipe that so called "doesn't
work" then NO ONE will even try that recipe again because they know it
"doesn't work" thus they are one of the few people who can actually make it.
So those are just my thoughts. And as 4 the four slot thing I think that
might be real. I think this recipe probably is 4 slots. But then again how
do you all know that I haven't made one my self and just lying? Dont trust
any one cept guildmates that's what I have learned over the years.

Roj
